name: The Drug Models Love "Slow Hope Parade"  |  CD Release: 24th August 2009
description:
Slow Hope Parade was written and recorded in NY over the course of a nine month period between (and during...) blackouts, benders, moments of bliss, philosophical isolation and spiritual derailment (by Kevin McGinnis ex-Ursula Points, Dopo Yume). 
Ninety-five percent of this record was recorded in one take straight thru. 
Contributions from Carl Glanville (U2 engineer/mixer) and the great and talented Alex Newport at Future Shock Studio serve to merely embelish this stunningly brilliant record. 

NB: This CD is to be released 24th August 2009 | The DigitalDownload is available NOW!!!

All orders placed will be shipped in good time for the release date.
